Source.name: EBS Sensor: MFG PO Oracle Text Intermedia search index is out of sync for some items in iProcurement Catalog - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: MFG PO Oracle Text Intermedia search index is out of sync for some items in iProcurement Catalog - Weekly
Source.Description: Oracle Text (previously Intermedia) search index is out of sync for some items, and will result in search by Item Number sometimes not returning results

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_MFG_PO_IP_INTERMEDIA_ORACLE_TEXT_SEARCH_ISSUES' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'Operating_Unit_Id:' || s.Operating_Unit_Id || ', Item_Number:' || s.Item_Number || ', Description:' || s.Description || ', Last_Update_Date:' || s.Last_Update_Date || ', Inventory_Item_Id:' || s.Inventory_Item_Id || ', Item_Type:' || s.Item_Type key_data FROM (SELECT RecentItems.org_id Operating_Unit_Id, RecentItems.segment1 Item_Number, RecentItems.description Description, last_update_date Last_Update_Date, RecentItems.inventory_item_id Inventory_Item_Id, RecentItems.item_type Item_Type FROM (SELECT icicht.creation_date, icicht.last_update_date, icicht.org_id, msib.segment1, msib.description, icicht.inventory_item_id, icicht.unit_price, icicht.ip_category_name, icicht.po_category_id, icicht.item_type, contains(icicht.ctx_desc, msib.segment1) FROM apps.icx_cat_items_ctx_hdrs_tlp icicht, apps.mtl_system_items_b msib, ( select inventory_item_id from ( select inventory_item_id from apps.icx_cat_items_ctx_hdrs_tlp icicht where icicht.last_update_date > sysdate - 365 AND icicht.source_type = 'MASTER_ITEM' order by last_update_date desc) WHERE rownum < 1000 ) RecentUpdatedOrCreatedIcxItem WHERE NOT EXISTS (select 1 from apps.icx_cat_items_ctx_hdrs_tlp icichtb where contains(icichtb.ctx_desc, msib.segment1) > 0 ) AND msib.organization_id = icicht.org_id AND msib.inventory_item_id = icicht.inventory_item_id and icicht.source_type = 'MASTER_ITEM' and icicht.inventory_item_id = RecentUpdatedOrCreatedIcxItem.inventory_item_id and rownum <= 1000 order by icicht.org_id, icicht.last_update_date desc) RecentItems where rownum <=5) s
